MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CP780201406
Licensee Name: Michigan Department of Human Services
Licensee Address: 235 S. Grand Avenue
Lansing, MI 48909
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 373-3768
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Susan Fulton, Administrator
Ismael Ahmed, Designee
Name of Facility: Shiawassee County DHS
Facility Address: Suite 1
1975 W Main St
Owosso, MI 48867
Facility Telephone #: (989) 725-3200
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, DHS
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
A written request was received from the Program Manager, Pam Holman, to add
terms to the license for Adoption Placement Services and Adoption Evaluation
Services.
III. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The agency will be supervising adoption functions for purchase of service adoption
cases sent to private child placing agencies.
IV. Recommendation
The requested terms were added to the license.
Janice M. Tribble Date: 12/15/2010
Division Director
2
